Content:
Hi all.

As the total suggests...
My famaly ( wife, 2 kids dog and Cat ! ) and I immigrated to Nova scotia approximately 2 years ago and every day has been a grind trying to settle in so havnt found hobbies yet.

ive always had bikes...
Honda CB 400 N
Kawa GPZ 750
Honda gold wing 1100
And a awesome BMW 2012 F700gs

I'm 50 now and missing bikes , but want to get something for summer months to get to work and back ( 50km a day ) and to take the wife for a occasional breakfast ride etc...

In Cape Town ( South Africa ) BMW gave me a maxi while my bike was in for repairs and i thought it was cool !

So question is: what type of maxi scooters are available in Canada in the 350 / 400cc range and what do you sugest with a reason please ...?

Thanks
David.
